uk.ac.ox.cs.diadem.webapi.pagestate

Interface PageState


  • public interface PageState
    A page state is a capture of the current state of a browser. It serves primarily to compare two such captures.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int SIMILARITY_THRESHOLD
      Up to this many characters may have changed for a document to be "similar"

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean atSameLocation(PageState other)
      Returns true if the pagestate represents a page with the same location URL.
      int getAtomicEditDistance(PageState other)
      Returns the edit distance in terms of fine-grained, atomic units such as characters.
      List<uk.ac.ox.cs.diadem.webapi.pagestate.PageDifference> getDifferences(PageState other)
      Returns a list of actual differences.
      int getEditDistance(PageState other)
      Returns the edit distance in terms of nodes.
      boolean identicalTo(PageState other)
      Returns true if the other PageState is identical to this one.
      boolean isDifferentPage(PageState other)
      Returns true if the pagestate represents a different page (different location or content).
      boolean similarTo(PageState other)
      Returns true if the other PageState is similar to this one.

    • Field Detail

      • SIMILARITY_THRESHOLD

        static final int SIMILARITY_THRESHOLD
        Up to this many characters may have changed for a document to be "similar"

    • Method Detail

      • getDifferences

        List<uk.ac.ox.cs.diadem.webapi.pagestate.PageDifference> getDifferences(PageState other)
        Returns a list of actual differences.
        See Also:
        PageDifference

      • getAtomicEditDistance

        int getAtomicEditDistance(PageState other)
        Returns the edit distance in terms of fine-grained, atomic units such as characters.

      • getEditDistance

        int getEditDistance(PageState other)
        Returns the edit distance in terms of nodes.

      • identicalTo

        boolean identicalTo(PageState other)
        Returns true if the other PageState is identical to this one.

      • similarTo

        boolean similarTo(PageState other)
        Returns true if the other PageState is similar to this one. The specific meaning of similar is determine by the implementation, e.g., through a threshold on the edit distance.

      • isDifferentPage

        boolean isDifferentPage(PageState other)
        Returns true if the pagestate represents a different page (different location or content).

      • atSameLocation

        boolean atSameLocation(PageState other)
        Returns true if the pagestate represents a page with the same location URL.
